topic: need a survey for beef tenderloin among my company

questions.text: On a scale of 1 to 10, how satisfied are you with the quality of our beef tenderloin?
How would you rate the tenderness of the beef tenderloin?
How often do you purchase beef tenderloin?
Which of the following best describes your reason for purchasing beef tenderloin?
What aspects of our beef tenderloin could be improved?
How would you rate the value for money of our beef tenderloin?
